text:
="preserve">Beatboxing is making percussive noises with the mouth, lips, tongue and voice. Performers try an imitate the sounds of a drum machine. It is used a lot in hip-hop music.
it also includes the use of humming, singing and tapping.
a famous beatboxer is codfish, his famous "no diggity" song is widely heard throughout the beatboxing community.
[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ac23w_M-4As codfish-no diggity]
